## EDA - Energy Technology RD&D Budget
### This dataset has been taken from [International Energy Agency](https://www.iea.org/)
##### The focus of this study is explore the [RD&D Budget Database](https://www.iea.org/data-and-statistics/data-product/energy-technology-rd-and-d-budget-database-2#documentation), which tracks the trends in spendings made for energy technologies in the IEA countries since 1974.
    In this project we will be looking at:
  • Which of the countries are a part of International Energy Agency (IEA)?
  • Which of the sectors are provided more budget? Along with this we will also compare countries to see which to the country has highest or lowest spendings as per the sectors.
  • Total budget allocated by countries for Research and Development of Energy Technologies

We will see further as we explore our dataset.

Note: The dataset when downloaded from the [IEA](https://www.iea.org/) was in the form of .xlsx file containing columns for each year starting from 1974.
For convenience of data handling (preparation, cleaning & visualisation) the year columns have been Unpivoted using Excel's Power Query and then the required sheets were saved as CSV files.

The original xlsx file will also be available if you want to work with it directly.
